[http://pro-networking-h17007.external.hp.com/us/en/support/converter/index.aspx?productNum=3CRXJK10075 HP us/en information page] Alternate '''3Com''' model of WL-523 "WPCA-118G_V00" and "ENG-204-4000" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. [[Category:English Documentation]]
